feed.title: Akash Pandey
feed.subtitle: This is my personal website. It is supposed to contain posts on stuff that I am working on currently.

entry.title: Software defined networking
entry.content:
In this post I’ll try to summarize what I have learned about Software Defined Networking over past few months. This should serve as a guide to uninitiated as it is from the perspective of someone new to it.

The excellent introductory video by Scott Shenkar will give you a perpective on SDN from one of those who coined this term in the first place.
entry.summary: In this post I’ll try to summarize what I have learned about Software Defined Networking over past few months. This should serve as a guide to uninitiated as it is from the perspective of someone new to it.
